title: Honey and mustard glazed chicken salad with olive oil and balsamic dressing

default: ½ chicken breast, skin removed, sliced into strips
½ red onion, sliced into thin wedges

steps: Heat two tablespoons of the olive oil in a frying pan. Fry the chicken for 5-6 minutes, until golden-brown and cooked through, and then transfer to a plate.
Fry the onion in the pan until soft.
Mix the honey and mustard together in a large bowl. Add the rocket to the bowl along with the chicken and onion. Toss together and drizzle with a little balsamic vinegar.
Place onto a large serving plate and serve.
